Plot: A widowed Ukrainian plumber and a widowed Cree waitress fall madly in love resulting in a riotous fireworks display of conflicts with friends and family.
Title: Mixed Blessings
Writer: Drew Hayden Taylor, Ron E. Scott, Ric Beairsto
Actors: Gary Basaraba, Tina Lameman, Big Daddy Tazz, Griffin Powell-Arcand
